name: Beginning and termination of extended benefit period
text: §383-173  Beginning and termination of extended benefit period.  Whenever an extended benefit period is to become effective in this State as a result of a state "on" indicator, or an extended benefit period is to be terminated in this State as a result of a state "off" indicator, the director shall make an appropriate public announcement. [L 1971, c 187, pt of §13; am L 1982, c 58, §3]
